data.title: Amazing Turkey Reuben
data.text: I visit Broad Street Deli at least once a week. I LOVE the Turkey Reuben and get it messy (extra sauce and extra slaw). Price is great, filling sandwich, chips and soda under $10.

data.title: Really Good Bagels
data.text: This place does not look like much and if you're walking by you could easily miss it, however if you are in the area Broad Street Bagels is a great place to start your morning.  I was out for a morning walk on a Sunday morning and stumbled across this place.  It was closed, as it always is on the weekends, but I made note of it so I could return the next day.  It is very small and only has a few tables, but the bagels are delicious.  I ordered a bagel sandwich with sausage, egg and cheese and it was prepared right in front of me.  The coffee was fresh and hot.  The staff was very friendly and it seemed as if they had their fair share of regulars coming through that Monday morning.  It does not look like much from the inside or out, but do not let that keep you away.  The bagels are really good.

data.title: Damn good bagel
data.text:
I lived in Manhattan around the corner from the best bagels in the world. These come close. A nice crunchy skin and soft but not doughy inside.

Really nice staff and the coffee was dark and strong. Also had flavored coffee for the wife.

If you are in Columbus, check them out.

data.title: Great breakfast option!
data.text: Nice selection of fresh bagels and breakfast sandwiches and pastries.  Good coffee, friendly service.

data.title: One of the best values in downtown Columbus
data.text: I work right next door to Broad Street Bagel so it is a frequent breakfast spot as they have very tasty bagels and delicious pimento cream cheese. Their lunch wraps are very tasty as well and overall, it is one of the best priced eating spots in downtown Columbus where lunch can run you an easy $10.00. The best thing about this place are the people who work there ... the guys making the bagels and the girl running the register are fast, friendly, and efficient.

data.title: Great Coffee, good food
data.text: I work fairly close to here and frequent this place a lot. They have reasonably priced coffee and they prepare the food in front of you. It's a great place to go if you need lunch quickly.
